reframing_strategy: ^Whenever I'm feeling stressed, I try to reframe my situation.
^To use it, just change your perspective on a situation and find something meaningful in a stressful situation.
^Or find that your hardship will lead to something greater.
^For example, I'm having a hard time studying now. But in the future, my hard work will get me a good job.
kapwa: ^In the Bilog ng Buhay, one of them is Kapwa. Or in other wods, hang out with your friends!
^Spending time with your friends and having fun with them is a great way to destress.
